Yes...Democrats decided to give a free pass to Pres. Bush and GOP cronies on war crimes...meanwhile anytime a Democrat coughs the wrong way and the GOP calls for a special prosecutor and millions later Ken Star came up with nothing....8 Benghazi committees and nothing....now e-mails and nothing...no proof just speculation and same old foot political stomping. Aside from pre-Reagan crap that went down...some of the things he did were terrible. Iran-Contra? So what about Pres. BUSH Sitting like a DOPE and doing nothing for 9 min after twin towers hit. Iraq War fiasco and feeding false info and Intel to ALL Abu-Graib Halliburton FEMA and Hurricane Catrina And Pres. Bush waiting 4 days to send ships to NOLA after. Blackwater and NOLA The fact that Pres. Bush and Dick Chenney committed war crimes and also crimes against humanity by lying about the reasons for war. Maybe Democrats should remember the next time the GOP do something that is really reckless like ignore warnings and intell regarding an eminent terrorist attack given by the outgoing administration . Maybe we should speak up more on how GOP refused the funds to step up Benghazi and other embassy's security...
And not a peep out of him about the 10,000 jobs lost when Macy's, Sears, Kmart and The Limited shut their doors, all while he has his garbage made in China - can we spell HYPOCRITE!
Yeah let's make it strong...not prejudice like trump wants to and in the end destroy it more...neither one is fit to be president.

Really it takes more faith to believe in the nonsense of evolution crap than to have faith in God. Woooo such big words with your mindless conclusions. And regarding """"the invisible space daddy"""" part of your brainless rant-we shall see how brave you really are someday when your miserable carcass stands in front of the God you so proudly and bravely mock and disbelieve in. Yes, we will see how well it works out for you. Really going to suck to be you some day but that's your choice. And no I could care less what you think nor will I come back to read any more of your uninspiring comments. Evolution is as illogical as much as it is impossible.
